channel.title: Lectures - Math 660 - Summer 2011
channel.description: Lectures from the Summer 2011 quarter of Math 660, taught by Jim Fowler.

item.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to complex numbers
item.description: A lecture on section 1.1.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 2: Analytic functions
item.description: A lecture on section 2.1.1, 2.1.2 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 3: Polynomials and rational functions
item.description: A lecture on section 2.1.3, 2.1.4 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 4: Sequences and series
item.description: A lecture on section 2.2.1, 2.2.2, 2.2.3 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 5: Power series
item.description: A lecture on section 2.2.4 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 6: Abel's limit theorem
item.description: A lecture on section 2.2.5 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 7: Exponential, trigonometric functions, logarithm
item.description: A lecture on section 2.3.1, 2.3.2, 2.3.3, 2.3.4 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 8: Metric spaces
item.description: A lecture on section 3.1.1, 3.1.2, 3.1.3 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 9: Compactness
item.description: A lecture on section 3.1.4, 3.1.5, 3.1.6 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 10: Closed curves
item.description: A lecture on section 3.2.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 11: Analytic functions in regions
item.description: A lecture on section 3.2.3, 3.2.4 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 12: Linear transformations
item.description: A lecture on section 3.3.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 13: Cross ratio
item.description: A lecture on section 3.3.2 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 14: Circles
item.description: A lecture on section 3.3.4, 3.3.5 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 15: Level curves
item.description: A lecture on section 3.4.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 16: Elementary mappings
item.description: A lecture on section 3.4.2 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 17: Riemann surfaces
item.description: A lecture on section 3.4.3 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 18: Line integrals I
item.description: A lecture on section 4.1.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 19: Line integrals II
item.description: A lecture on section 4.1.2, 4.1.3 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 20: Cauchy's theorem
item.description: A lecture on section 4.1.4, 4.1.5 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 21: Index of a point
item.description: A lecture on section 4.2.1 from the textbook.

item.title: Lecture 22: Cauchy's integral formula
item.description: A lecture on section 4.2.2 from the textbook.
